title: Ayurveda - harmony of body, mind and soul | KeralaTourism
description: Ayurveda is the oldest healthcare system in the world. This traditional health care system combines the profound thoughts of medicine and philosophy. This website provides all you want to know about Ayurveda like Rejuvenation Therapies, Ayurvedic Medicines, Diagnoses of disease in Ayurveda and many more.
